channel.title: raspberrypi on What I learned today
channel.description: Recent content in raspberrypi on What I learned today

item.title: How to configure multiple wifi networks on a RaspberryPi Zero W
item.description: If you install Raspian on a RaspberryPi Zero W one essential step is to setup Wifi. You save a configuration file called wpa_supplicant.conf on the boot-Partition. But how do you configure multiple networks in one step?

item.title: The easiest way to install NodeJS on a Raspberry Pi
item.description: The installation of NodeJs on a RaspberryPi can be accomplished on various ways. This article shows the easiest way to do it.
